scripts.dev: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel index.html --no-cache --no-source-maps
scripts.release: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build index.html --no-minify --no-cache
scripts.release:relative: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build index.html --no-minify --no-cache --public-url ./
